nodes.bodyText: How about calling this bytes instead of v?

I did that for consistency with byte[] v = PlatformDependent.allocateUninitializedArray(length); later in the same method (it's just cut off by GitHub's diff viewer), but sure. I could change both so they're still consistent?

bytes or array is a good name IMO. I'm not sure what v means.
See 
  
    
      netty/buffer/src/main/java/io/netty/buffer/ByteBufUtil.java
    
    
         Line 844
      in
      a76580b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           final byte[] array;
I've renamed it to bytes, along with the existing byte[] v in that method (in a separate commit).
